author: jefft
msg: Replace cvs.get-src.dir with cvs.get-src.{content,project}-dir, so that we can
build docs in a subdirectory of a project.
content-dir is the directory to check out (usu. src/documentation)
project-dir is the base directory from which to build docs (usu .).
For an example of non-root project-dir, see forrest-template-cvs.xml

author: nicolaken
msg: Updated avalon-tigris skin by merging what was in CVS here and
what was used in Avalon with its Cocoon-generated site.

author: jefft
msg: Add a README about forrestbot jars
